snippet: Unfriending the I.R.S.? A Facebook co-founder decamps to tax-friendlier shores, but Eduardo Saverin's spokesman says it isn't about the money. When you are investing in lots of countries, apparently, it's better in Singapore.
abstract: Unfriending the I.R.S.? A Facebook co-founder decamps to tax-friendlier shores, but Eduardo Saverin's spokesman says it isn't about the money. When you are investing in lots of countries, apparently, it's better in Singapore.

headline.main: A Facebook Founder Renounces His U.S. Citizenship
headline.print_headline: A Facebook Founder Renounces His United States Citizenship
